subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal won five consecutive games midway through the match and beat No. 16-seeded Kei Nishikori, 6-4, 6-4, to reach the quarterfinals of the Sony Ericsson Open in Key Biscayne, Fla.
snippet: Rafael Nadal won five consecutive games midway through the match and beat No. 16-seeded Kei Nishikori, 6-4, 6-4, to reach the quarterfinals of the Sony Ericsson Open in Key Biscayne, Fla.
